resources.string: Feel free to donate if you like

1. Open Wechat, navigate to "Scan QR Code"

2. Click menu

3. Click "Choose QR Code from Album"

4. Pick Brevent donation QR Code
Donation via Wechat requires Storage permission to save QR code into Album
Please install Alipay, or PayPal to donate
Please install Alipay, WeChat, or PayPal to donate
